Package com.xceptance.testbddy.core.reporting

Interface ReportInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtentReportInterface
    public interface ReportInterface
    The interface for reporting frameworks.
    Author:
    ckeiner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String PATH
      The path where the report should be created

      • feature

        ReportElement feature​(java.lang.String description)
        Creates a ReportElement for a feature with the specified description.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the feature.
        Returns:
        A ReportElement depicting the feature.

      • scenario

        ReportElement scenario​(java.lang.String description)
        Creates a ReportElement for a scenario with the specified description.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the scenario.
        Returns:
        A ReportElement depicting the scenario.

      • scenarioOutline

        <T> ReportElement scenarioOutline​(java.lang.String description,
                                  T testdata)
        Creates a ReportElement for a scenario outline with the specified description and test datum.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the test datum.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the scenario outline.
        testdata - The test datum for the scenario outline.
        Returns:
        A ReportElement depicting the scenario outline.

      • scenarioOutline

        <T> ReportElement scenarioOutline​(java.lang.String description)
        Creates a ReportElement for a scenario outline with the specified description.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the test datum.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the scenario outline.
        Returns:
        A ReportElement depicting the scenario outline.

      • step

        ReportElement step​(com.aventstack.extentreports.GherkinKeyword keyword,
                   java.lang.String description)
        Creates a ReportElement for a step with the specified description.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the step.
        keyword - The GherkinKeyword for either Given, When, Then or And.
        Returns:
        A ReportElement depicting the step.

      • finishReport

        void finishReport()
        Completes the report.
